meanings.definition: To surpass in mastery or skill.
meanings.sent1: She outmastered her opponent in chess.
meanings.sent2: He outmastered all his classmates in math.
meanings.sent3: The young magician outmastered the old wizard in a magic duel.
meanings.sent4: The new chef outmastered the experienced cook in creating delicious dishes.
meanings.sent5: The clever detective outmastered the criminal in solving the case.

meanings.definition: To defeat or outdo in a competition or contest.
meanings.sent1: The team outmastered their rivals in the basketball game.
meanings.sent2: She outmastered her opponent in the singing competition.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel outmastered the birds in gathering nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: The superhero outmastered the villain in the final battle.
meanings.sent5: The student outmastered the teacher in the spelling bee.
